domain.description: Fully qualified domain name of the Microsoft Active Directory (AD) that your storage virtual machine belongs to.

mountOptions.description: Mount options that are available for DataSync to access an SMB location. See SMB Mount Options below.

password.description: Password of a user who has permission to access your SVM.

user.description: Username that can mount the location and access the files, folders, and metadata that you need in the SVM.
